albums.name: A Scanner Darkly
albums.description: Images scanned from prints. Mostly from 35mm, but not all. Consequently quality is fairly low and colours are often off.

albums.name: Basic Moods of Life
albums.description: Fractal art representing six of the Basic Moods of Life.

albums.name: Beasties and Critters
albums.description: The animals we we share our planet with.

albums.name: Buildings of Bendigo
albums.description: Founded in the 1850's gold rush, Bendigo's buildings reflect its wealth and today's buildings show its future.

albums.name: Cityscapes
albums.description: Interesting buildings, skylines and other structures found in cities.

albums.name: Destination Denmark
albums.description: My favourites from my time in Denmark.

albums.name: European Wandering
albums.description: Favourites from our time in England and Europe.

albums.name: Fractal Art
albums.description: I wish I had more time to devote to this.

albums.name: Kangaroo Island (2024)
albums.description: Images from our holiday to Kangaroo Island, South Australia.

albums.name: Melbourne CBD Walk
albums.description: I found myself in Melbourne for an errand with lots of time to kill. Each time I came to a corner, I'd turn whichever way felt right. No destination in mind.

albums.name: Moments in Life
albums.description: Those little things that remind us what it's like to be human.

albums.name: No. 7 Reservoir
albums.description: Bendigo does not lie in a river. And in the early days a plan was hatched to build eight reservoirs. No 1. leaked, No.7 was built and plans for the remaining six abandoned.

albums.name: Panoramas
albums.description: I do love me a wider perspective on life.

albums.name: The Sky Above
albums.description: The sky at any time of the day or night.

albums.name: Toys & Games
albums.description: Spending time playing is always good for the soul.

albums.name: Warhammer Miniatures
albums.description: Photos of my Warhammer miniature collection. All hand-painted by me.
